verse: 1:1 Pawulo, omutume wa Kristo Yesu ng'okulagira kwa Katonda Omulokozi waffe bwe kuli n'okwa Kristo Yesu essuubi lyaffe;
2 eri Timoseewo omwana wange ddala olw'okukkiriza: ekisa, okusaasira, emirembe bibenga. gy'oli ebiva eri Katonda Kitaffe ne Kristo Yesu Mukama waffe.
3 Nga bwe nnakubuulirira okubeera mu Efeso, bwe nnali nga ŋŋenda e Makedoni, olagirenga abamu obutayigirizanga bulala,
4 newakubadde okulowoozanga enfumo n'ebigambo by'obuzaale ebitakoma, ebireeta empaka okusinga obuwanika bwa Katonda obuli mu kukkiriza; bwe nkola bwe ntyo ne kaakano:
5 Naye enkomerero y'ekiragiro kwe kwagala okuva mu mutima omulongoofu n'omwoyo omulungi n'okukkiriza okutalina bukuusa:
6 ebyo abamu babiwunjukamu ne bakyamiramu bigambo ebitaliimu;
7 nga baagala okuba ng'abayigiriza b'amateeka, nga tebategeera bye boogera newakubadde bye bakakasa.
8 Naye tumanyi ng'amateeka malungi, omuntu bw'agasoma ng'amateeka bwe gali,

9 ng'amanyi ekyo nti amateeka tegateekerwawo muntu mutuukirivu, wabula abatali batuukirivu n'abajeemu, abatatya Katonda n'abalina ebibi, abatali batukuvu n'abavvoola Katonda, abatta bakitaabwe ne bannyaabwe, abassi b'abantu,
10 abenzi, abalya ebisiyaga, abanyazi b'aban tu, abalimba, abalayirira obwereere, n'ebirala byonna ebiwakana n'okuyigiriza okw'obulamu;
11 ng'enjiri bw'eri ey'ekitiibwa kya Katonda eyeebazibwa gye nnateresebwa nze.
12 Mmwebaza oyo eyampa amaanyi, yeKristo Yesu Mukama waffe, kubanga yandowooza nga ndi mwesigwa, bwe yanteeka mu buweereza,
13 olubereberye bwe nnali omuvumiera omuyigganya era ow'ekyejo: naye nnasaasirwa kubanga nnakolanganga ssimanyi mu butakkiriza;
14 ekisa kya Mukama waffe ne kyeyon gera nnyo wamu n'okukkiriza n'okwagala okuli mu Kristo Yesu.
15 Ekigambo kyesigwa, era ekisaanira okukkirizibwa kwonna nti Kristo Yesuyajja mu nsi okulokola abalina ebibi; mu bo nze w'olubereberye;
16 naye kyennava nsaasirwa Yesu Kristo alyoke alabisize mu nze ow'olubereberye okugumiikiriza kwe kwonna, okubeeranga ekyokulabirako eri abo abagenda okumukkiriza olw'obulamu obutaggwaawo.
17 Era Kabaka ow'emirembe n'emirembe, ataggwaawo, atalabika, Katonda amu, aweebwenga ettendo n'ekitiibwa emirembe n'emirembe. Amiina.
18 Ekiragiro kino nkuteresa, mwana wange Timoseewo, ng'ebigambo bya bannabbi bwe byali bye baakwogerako edda, olyoke olwanirenga mubyo olutalo olulungi,
19 ng'onyweza okukkiriza n'omwoyo omulungi, abalala gwe basindika eri ne bamenyekerwa okukkiriza kwabwe:
20 mu abo ye Kumenayo ne Alegezanda: be nnawa eri Setaani, balyoke bayigirizibwe obutavumanga.
